message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm a bit higher than $85. I can do $90, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $87.50? That's the lowest I can go.
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I can do $91, but that's as low as I can go. I really think you'll love this product!
I understand you're getting close to your minimum, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Can you do $89? That's the best I can do.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob! However, I think you'll really love this product, and I'm willing to give you a slight discount. I can do $90, but that's as low as I can go. I'm not budging from here.
I appreciate your willingness to give me a slight discount, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you do $88? That's the best I can do.
I'm not sure how much lower I can go, Bob. I think this is my final offer. I can do $89, but that's it. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand that this is your final offer, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $88.50. That's the lowest I can go.
